column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I've heard a lot of hype about this place and it definitely lives up to it. The pork bao bun was amazing. If you like spicy food
column2: I'd recommend specifically asking them to make it extra spicy. I just ordered the spiciest option that was written on the menu
column3: but I didn't find it spicy at all. It seems to get pretty crowded so expect a wait but it's completely worth it.
